title: The Unbearable Wholeness of Being: God, Evolution, and the Power of Love
description: CATHOLIC PRESS ASSOCIATION BOOK AWARD WINNER! NAUTILUS BOOK AWARD - SILVER in Science & Religion The award-winning author of Christ in Evolution and The Emergent Christ breaks new ground with this capstone in a trilogy that opens our eyes to the everywhere active, all powerful, all intelligent Love that guides and directs our new awareness of interrelatedness and interbeing. She We all have a part to play in this unfolding Love; we are wholes within wholes; persons within persons; religions within religions. We are one body and we seek one mind and heart so that the whole may become more whole, more personal and unified in love. This is our Christian vocation, to live in the Christ who is rising up from the ashes of death to become for us the God of the future.
author: Ilia Delio
